name: MicroTown
description:
Build and manage your growing town in this relaxing village construction and management simulator with focus on production chains, villager desires and light combat elements.



Start with nothing and grow into a bustling town. Gather and process resources, maintain your villager needs, and defend your settlement.



Collect and record knowledge, research and advance through technologies, and unlock new materials and professions.



Establish many production chains with unique processing buildings and outputs.



Everything from mining ores and crafting tools to growing crops and brewing beer.



Mr. Piggles agrees.
